name: Mini platformer (gdaash)
description:
Mini platformer is a hardcore game with random levels and random controls. Complete as many levels as possible without dying once. The intensity of emotions is like in a flappy bird.

Control from the keyboard, gamepad or by clicking on the buttons in the interface. Available options are WASD and arrows (up - jump, down - jump down from the bridges).

To enter the doors, use "Down" (W or down arrow).

In some levels, double jump and wall jump are available. This information is displayed in the interface to the left of the playing field.

Supports gamepad.
